title: Aagun
overview: The movie Aagun is a drama film released in 2014, directed by Joydeep Mukherjee under the banner of Pitrasish Films Limited. The music is composed by Anindya Banerjee and the lyrics are written by Priyo Chattapadhyay. The cast includes Sabyasachi Chakraborty, Rajatava Datta, Arindam Seal, Abir Chatterjee, Gourav Chakraborty, Indrashish Roy, Sudipa Basu and Ridhima Ghosh.
